#summary This shows how to change or add to the default list for an election.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

WIth the amount of windows it is sometimes confusing on where to change certain things. This page is being created to show where and how to change the default list. This will only be done once every ten years so it will be nice to update people on how to change it in the future


= Details =

In order to edit the list, you first have to go into the Contest - Active window and double click the one you wish to edit. Click on the counties tab to view the current list. Select the counties you wish to add/remove from the list. When finished, select save and the list should be created.
